name: Scroll Me Up Button
author: Md. Israfil Mahmud Raju

sections.description:
Scroll Me Up Button is a lightweight and customizable WordPress plugin that adds a scroll to top button on your site. With 19+ switch icons to choose from, you can easily customize the look of the button to match your site’s design. Additionally, you can customize the position of the button on your page, choosing from several placement options.

FEATURES

  1. One-click enable/disable
  2. 45+ switch icons to choose from
  3. Customizable button text
  4. Customizable button background color
  5. Customizable button position on page
  6. Options to show/hide button on mobile devices
  7. Option to enable/disable smooth scroll animation
  8. Option to add custom CSS for further customization
  9. Preview on Dashboard
  10. Option to add Text bellow the Icon
  11. Option to change Text Orientation

HOW IT WORKS

The plugin is very easy to use in WordPress. Just follow these quick steps-

  1. Install Scroll Me Up Button and activate it.
  2. Check your website, and you should already see the scroll to top floating switch at the bottom right.
  3. To customize, click on the ScrollMeUp menu on your WordPress dashboard.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

-This is the initial release of Scroll Me up Button.

2.0.0

-Interactive Dashboard Panel
-Added Icon With Text Feature
-Added Preview in Dashboard
-Added more than 25+ Icons
-Added Demo Templates
